name: Crystal Journey (Nocturna1) (Nocturna1)
description:
How it fits the Theme: Each Level is less than a minute long. In each subsequent level, the timer will decrease to increase difficulty.

A fun fast-paced 2D retro platformer. This game is about a fox that goes on an adventure visiting various locations around the world in search of crystals.

How To Play

  • Collect $150 worth of precious crystals to advance to the next level.
  • Avoid poisonous fungus so you don't drop crystals!
  • Finish each level before the time runs out.

Controls

  • Movement: A, D
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Pause Game: P
